Articles.Content:
So I'm now setting up a new modded save file whilst trying out a whole bunch of new mods. So I've added KAS so I can repair minor damage in space, Interstellar mod to give me a reason to have space stations (even though the warp drive seems highly unappealing to me) and visual enhancements to give Kerbin a nice shiny new look. The only problem is I still don't have any new Spaceplane parts to play around with. I was considering the ones included in B9 that Scott Manley uses but I can't find an updated version for .23.5, probably because some of it is now stock.

So what would be a good mod to look at for adding spaceplane parts? I'm mostly interested in getting my hands on some sort of cargo bay that Manley has been using in his Interstellar series so if anyone knows of some with a working cargo bay compatible with .23.5 I would love to know!

Moved to General Add-on Affairs.

Oops sorry about that, forgot the forum has a special section for mods.
If you want to use b9 first install it and then use these fixes. Other than that, procedural wings is pretty nice for making planes.
